pageProps.html:

파워 목록

An Aappearing at the end of a power’s name in the power lists denotes an augmentable power. An Xdenotes a power with an XP component paid by the manifester.

파워 사슬: Some powers reference other powers that they are based upon. Only information in a power later in the power chain that is different from the base power is covered in the power being described. Header entries and other information that are the same as the base power are not repeated. The same holds true for powers that are the equivalents of spells, only the way the power varies from the spell is noted, such as power point cost.

제시 순서: In the power lists and the power descriptions that follow them, the powers are presented in alphabetical order by name—except for those belonging to certain power chains and those that are psionic equivalents of spells. When a power’s name begins with “lesser,” “greater,” “mass,” or a similar kind of qualifier, the power description is alphabetized under the second word of the power description instead. When the effect of a power is essentially the same as that of a spell, the power’s name is simply “Psionic” followed by the name of the spell, and it is alphabetized according to the spell name.

구현자 레벨: A power’s effect often depends on the manifester level, which is the manifester’s psionic class level. A creature with no classes has a manifester level equal to its Hit Dice unless otherwise specified. The word “level” in the power lists always refers to manifester level.

생명체 및 캐릭터: “Creatures” and “characters” are used synonymously in the power descriptions.

증강: Many powers vary in strength depending on how many power points you put into them. The more power points you spend, the more powerful the manifestation. However, you can spend only a total number of points on a power equal to your manifester level, unless you have an ability that increases your effective manifester level.

Many powers can be augmented in more than one way. When the Augment section contains numbered paragraphs, you need to spend power points separately for each of the numbered options. When a paragraph in the Augment section begins with “In addition,” you gain the indicated benefit according to how many power points you have already decided to spend on manifesting the power.

사이온/야생인 파워

1-레벨 사이온/야생인 파워

  • 영적 여행자: Enable yourself or another to join an astral caravan-enabled trip.
  • 끌림A: Subject has an attraction you specify.
  • 화살복제A: You create a few enhanced short-lived bolts, arrows, or bullets.
  • 정신 호출: Gain additional Knowledge check with +4 competence bonus.
  • 닻줄A: Instantly save yourself from a fall.
  • 생각 감추기: You conceal your motives.
  • 화염 조종A: Take control of nearby open flame.
  • 빛 조종: Adjust ambient light levels.
  • 소리 생성: Create the sound you desire.
  • 유리결정 조각A: Ranged touch attack for 1d6 points of piercing damage.
  • 강타, 사이오닉A: Humanoid creature of 4 HD or less loses next action.
  • 감속A: Target’s speed is halved.
  • 데자뷰A: Your target repeats his last action.
  • 사기저하A: Enemies become shaken.
  • 사이오닉 탐지: You detect the presence of psionics.
  • 행동불능화A: Subjects incorrectly believe they are disabled.
  • 소멸의 손길A: Touch deals 1d6 damage.
  • 주의산만: Target gets –4 bonus on Listen, Search, Sense Motive, and Spot checks.
  • 심령으로부터 보호A: An astral construct gains bonus against dismiss ectoplasm.
  • 교감A: You know the subject’s surface emotions.
  • 텅빈 정신A: You gain +2 on Will saves until your next action.
  • 에너지 광선A: Deal 1d6 energy (cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) damage.
  • 심령 휘감기: You entangle a foe in sticky goo.
  • 먼 손길A: Move small objects at a limited distance.
  • 부유A: You buoy yourself in water or other liquid.
  • 힘의 가림막A: Invisible disc provides +4 shield bonus to AC.
  • 기름칠, 사이오닉: Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.
  • 망치A: Melee touch attack deals 1d8/round.
  • 관성 갑옷A: Tangible field of force provides you with +4 armor bonus to AC.
  • 방향과 장소 알아내기: You discover where you are and what direction you face.
  • 물질 교반: You heat a creature or object.
  • 정신 추진A: Deal 1d10 damage.
  • 명령서A: Send a one-way telepathic message to subject.
  • 나의 빛A: Your eyes emit 20-ft. cone of light.
  • 예지, 방어적A: Gain +1 insight bonus to AC and saving throws.
  • 예지, 공격적A: Gain +1 insight bonus on your attack rolls.
  • 선견, 공격적A: Gain +2 insight bonus on your damage rolls.
  • 감각 연결A: You sense what the subject senses (single sense).
  • 스케이트: Subject slides skillfully along the ground.
  • 공감각: You receive one kind of sense when another sense is stimulated.
  • 텔렘패식 투사: Alter the subject’s mood.
  • 활력A: Gain 5 temporary hit points.

2-레벨 사이온/야생인 파워

  • 파워 부여A: Subject receives 2 power points.
  • 생체 피드백A: Gain damage reduction 2/–.
  • 신체 평형: You can walk on nonsolid surfaces.
  • 구름 정신: You erase knowledge of your presence from target’s mind.
  • 무정형체 감추기: Quasi-real membrane grants you concealment.
  • 뇌진탕 폭파A: Deal 1d6 force damage to target.
  • 소리 조종: Create very specific sounds.
  • 호전적 의도 탐지: You can detect hostile creatures within 30 ft. of you.
  • 자아 채찍A: Deal 1d4 Cha damage and daze for 1 round.
  • 엘프 시야: Gain low-light vision, +2 bonus on Search and Spot checks, and notice secret doors.
  • 에너지 적응, 명시A: Gain resistance 10 against one energy type.
  • 에너지 밀치기A: Deal 2d6 damage and knock subject back.
  • 에너지 기절A: Deal 1d6 damage and stun target if it fails both saves.
  • 특기 거머리A: Borrow another’s psionic or metapsionic feats.
  • 이드 암시A: Swift tendrils of thought disrupt and confuse your target.
  • 식별, 사이오닉: Learn the properties of a psionic item.
  • 고통 가하기A: Telepathic stab gives your foe –4 on attack rolls, or –2 if he makes the save.
  • 똑똑똑, 사이오닉: Opens locked or psionically sealed door.
  • 부유, 사이오닉: You move up and down, forward and back via mental support.
  • 정신 분열A: Daze creatures within 10 feet for 1 round.
  • 명령서, 광역A: You send a one-way telepathic message to an area.
  • 사이오닉 자물쇠: Secure a door, chest, or portal.
  • 고뇌 회상A: Foe takes 2d6 damage.
  • 감각 연결, 강제: Sense what subject senses.
  • 고통 공유: Willing subject takes some of your damage.
  • 생활 유지: Go without food and water for one day.
  • 유리결정 무리A: Crystal shards are sprayed forth doing 3d4 slashing damage.
  • 생각 방패A: Gain PR 13 against mind-affecting powers.
  • 통역마법, 사이오닉: You can communicate with intelligent creatures.

3-레벨 사이온/야생인 파워

  • 신체 보정A: You heal 1d12 damage.
  • 신체 정화A: You restore 2 points of ability damage.
  • 위험 감각A: You gain +4 bonus against traps.
  • 암시야, 사이오닉: See 60 ft. in total darkness.
  • 심령체 강제퇴거: Dissipates ectoplasmic targets and effects.
  • 사이오닉 무효화A: Cancels psionic powers and effects.
  • 에너지 화살A: Deal 5d6 energy damage in 120-ft. line.
  • 에너지 폭발A: Deal 5d6 energy damage in 40-ft. burst.
  • 에너지 반박A: Ectoburst of energy automatically targets your attacker for 4d6 damage once each round.
  • 에너지 벽: Create wall of your chosen energy type.
  • 투명상태 근절A: Negate invisibility in 50-ft. burst.
  • 예리한 칼날, 사이오닉: Doubles normal weapon’s threat range.
  • 정신 장벽A: Gain +4 deflection bonus to AC until your next action.
  • 정신 함정A: Drain 1d6 power points from anyone who attacks you with a telepathy power.
  • 사이오닉 폭발: Stun creatures in 30-ft. cone for 1 round.
  • 고통 공유, 강제A: Unwilling subject takes some of your damage.
  • 정신결정 간청A: Your psicrystal takes over your concentration power.
  • 염력의 힘A: Move an object with the sustained force of your mind.
  • 염력 밀치기A: Hurl objects with the force of your mind.
  • 시간 도약A: Subject hops forward in time 1 round/level.
  • 촉각시야A: Your telekinetic field tells you where everything is.
  • 편재 시야: You have all-around vision.

4-레벨 사이온/야생인 파워

  • 오라 시야A: Reveals creatures, objects, powers, or spells of selected alignment axis.
  • 일치: Hold mental conversation with another creature at any distance.
  • 죽음 재촉A: Implant a self-destructive compulsion.
  • 원격 시선 탐지: You know when others spy on you remotely.
  • 차원의 문, 사이오닉: Teleports you short distance.
  • 점술, 사이오닉: Provides useful advice for specific proposed action.
  • 공감적 피드백A: When you are hit in melee, your attacker takes damage.
  • 에너지 적응A: Your body converts energy to harmless light.
  • 이동의 자유, 사이오닉: You cannot be held or otherwise rendered immobile.
  • 지성 요새A: Those inside fortress take only half damage from all powers and psi-like abilities until your next action.
  • 정신세탁A: Subject’s recent experiences wiped away, bestowing negative levels.
  • 성격 기생충: Subject’s mind calves self-antagonistic splinter personality for 1 round/level.
  • 파워 거머리: Drain 1d6 power points/round while you maintain concentration; you gain 1/round.
  • 초자연적 개혁X: Subject can choose skills, feats, and powers anew for previous levels.
  • 염력 조작A: Telekinetically bull rush, disarm, grapple, or trip your target.
  • 순간이동 추적A: Learn destination of subject’s teleport.
  • 심령의 벽: You create a protective barrier.

5-레벨 사이온/야생인 파워

  • 신체 적응: Your body automatically adapts to hostile environments.
  • 캐텁시A: Psychic static inhibits power manifestation.
  • 심령 휘청거리는 자: Foglike predator deals 1 point of damage/two levels each round to an area.
  • 현신X: Make some powers permanent.
  • 거머리 장A: Leech power points each time you make a saving throw.
  • 상급 창조, 사이오닉: As psionic minor creation, plus stone and metal.
  • 이세계 전이, 사이오닉: Travel to other planes.
  • 파워 저항: Grant PR equal to 12 + level.
  • 초자연적 크러쉬A: Brutally crush subject’s mental essence, reducing subject to –1 hit points.
  • 분쇄 정신 공백: Cancels target’s mind blank effect.
  • 강철 의지의 탑A: Grant PR 19 against mind-affecting powers to all creatures within 10 ft. until your next turn.
  • 진실의 시야, 사이오닉A: See all things as they really are.

6-레벨 사이온/야생인 파워

  • 오라 변경A: Repairs psyche or makes subject seem to be something it is not.
  • 검은 드래곤의 숨결A: Breathe acid for 11d6 damage.
  • 구름 정신, 광역: Erase knowledge of your presence from the minds of one creature/level.
  • 비상사태, 사이오닉X: Sets trigger condition for another power.
  • 공동 집중: Take control of foe’s concentration power.
  • 분해, 사이오닉A: Turn one creature or object to dust.
  • 살덩이 융합A: Fuse subject’s flesh, creating a helpless mass.
  • 장거리 비행, 사이오닉: You fly at a speed of 40 ft. and can hustle over long distances.
  • 원격 보기 함정: Deal 8d6 points electricity damage to those who seek to view you at a distance.
  • 물체 염동A: Teleport to your hand an item you can see.
  • 생명 연장: Put yourself in a state akin to suspended animation.
  • 임시 가속A: Your time frame accelerates for 1 round.

7-레벨 사이온/야생인 파워

  • 뇌활동정지: Remove portion of subject’s brain stem.
  • 순간이동 우회: Choose destination for another’s teleport.
  • 에너지 전환: Offensively channel energy you’ve absorbed.
  • 에너지 파도A: Deal 13d4 damage of your chosen energy type in 120-ft. cone.
  • 폭발 회피A: You take no damage from a burst on a successful Reflex save.
  • 광기A: Subject is permanently confused.
  • 정신 공백, 개별: You are immune to scrying and mental effects.
  • 순간 선견, 사이오닉: You gain insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.
  • 떡갈나무 육체A: Your body becomes as hard as oak.
  • 위상의 문, 사이오닉: Invisible passage through wood or stone.
  • 은둔, 사이오닉X: Subject invisible to sight and remote viewing; renders subject comatose.
  • 초대형폭파A: Deal 13d6 damage in 15-ft. radius.

8-레벨 사이온/야생인 파워

  • 현실 왜곡X: Alters reality within power limits.
  • 강철 육체, 사이오닉: Your body becomes living iron.
  • 물질 가공X: Increase or decrease an object’s base hardness by 5.
  • 정신 공백, 사이오닉: Subject immune to mental/emotional effects, scrying, and remote viewing.
  • 죽음 회상: Subject dies or takes 5d6 damage.
  • 그림자 신체: You become a living shadow (not the creature).
  • 순간이동, 사이오닉 상급: As psionic teleport, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.
  • 진정한 대사작용: You regenerate 10 hit points/round.

9-레벨 사이온/야생인 파워

  • 친화의 장: Effects that affect you also affect others.
  • 어팝시X: You delete target’s psionic powers.
  • 동화: Incorporate creature into your own body.
  • 에테리얼화, 사이오닉: Become ethereal for 1 min./level.
  • 소우주A: Creature or creature lives forevermore in world of his own imagination.
  • 현실 수정X: As bend reality, but fewer limits.
  • 변함없는 신체: Ignore all harmful, and helpful, effects for 1 round.

사이온 분야 파워

에고이스트 (정신적대사작용) 분야 파워

  1. 1 피부 강화A: Gain +1 enhancement bonus to your AC for 10 min./level.
  2. 2 동물 친화력A: Gain +4 enhancement to one ability.
    카멜레온: Gain +10 enhancement bonus on Hide checks.
    공감적 전환A: Transfer another’s wounds to yourself.
  3. 3 심령 형태: You gain benefits of being insubstantial and can fly slowly.
    빠른 걸음: Instantly gain a move action.
  4. 4 변태: Assume shape of creature or object.
    초자연 뱀파이어: Touch attack drains 2 power points/level from foe.
  5. 5 사이오닉 환원AX: Return the dead to life before the psyche leaves the corpse.
    사이코피드백: Boost Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution at the expense of one or more other scores.
    극한 복원: Return a lost digit, limb, or other appendage to subject.
  6. 6 복원, 사이오닉: Restores level and ability score drains.
  7. 7 분열: You briefly duplicate yourself.
  8. 8 융합X: You combine your abilities and form with another.
  9. 9 변태, 상급X: Assume shape of any nonunique creature or object each round.

염동력자 (염동력) 분야 파워

  1. 1 물체 조종: Telekinetically animate a small object.
  2. 2 바람 조종A: You have control over wind speed and direction.
    에너지 유도화살A: Deal 3d6 energy damage to up to five subjects.
  3. 3 에너지 원뿔A: Deal 5d6 energy damage in 60-ft. cone.
  4. 4 신체 조종A: Take rudimentary control of your foe’s limbs.
    에너지 구A: Deal 7d6 energy damage in 20-ft. radius.
    관성 장벽: Gain DR 5/–.
  5. 5 에너지 흐름A: Deal 9d6 damage to one foe and half to another foe as long as you concentrate.
    불 속 탈출A: Cheat death by discorporating into nearby fire for one day.
  6. 6 무효화 방패: Subject is buffered from one dispel psionics effect.
    무의 사이오닉 장: Create a field where psionic power does not function.
  7. 7 레돕시: Powers targeting you rebound on manifester.
  8. 8 염동력의 구, 사이오닉: Mobile force globe encapsulates creature and moves it.
  9. 9 토네이도 폭파A: Vortex of air subjects your foes to 17d6 damage and moves them.

유목민 (시공간초월) 분야 파워

  1. 1 폭발: Gain +10 ft. to speed this round.
    순간이동 탐지A: Know when teleportation powers are used in close range.
  2. 2 차원 교환A: You and ally or two allies switch positions.
    부유, 사이오닉: Subject moves up and down, forward and back, at your direction.
  3. 3 영적 마차A: You lead astral traveler-enabled group to a planar destination.
  4. 4 차원의 닻, 사이오닉: Bars extra dimensional movement.
    차원 강제퇴거, 사이오닉: Forces a creature to return to its native plane.
    비행, 사이오닉: You fly at a speed of 60 ft.
  5. 5 해로운 순간이동A: Destructive teleport deals 9d6 damage.
    순간이동, 사이오닉: Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles/level.
    순간이동 트리거: Predetermined event triggers teleport.
  6. 6 추방, 사이오닉A: Banishes extraplanar creatures.
  7. 7 꿈 여행A: Travel to other places through dreams.
    에테리얼 기행, 사이오닉: Become ethereal for 1 round/level.
  8. 8 시간 도약, 광역A: Willing subjects hop forward in time.
  9. 9 순간이동 마법진, 사이오닉: Circle teleports any creatures inside to designated spot.
    Time RegressionX: Relive the last round.

예언가 (초감각) 분야 파워

  1. 1 운명 부조화: Your dissonant touch sickens a foe.
    예지: Gain +2 insight bonus to one roll.
  2. 2 투시 감각: See and hear a distant location.
    물체 읽기A: Learn details about an object’s previous owner.
    초자연적 노출에 대한 감각: You can find out about an area’s past.
  3. 3 탈출 탐지: You become difficult to detect with clairsentience powers.
    운명 연결A: You link the fates of two targets.
  4. 4 닻 내린 항해A: Establish a mishap-free teleport beacon.
    원격 보기X: See, hear, and potentially interact with subjects at a distance.
  5. 5 초감각적 손A: Emulate far hand at a distance.
    두번째 기회X: Gain a reroll.
  6. 6 예지, 상급: Gain +4 insight bonus to one roll.
  7. 7 하나의 운명: Reroll any roll you just failed.
  8. 8 초인지: You can deduce almost anything.
  9. 9 메타패컬티X: You learn details about any one creature.
    현실 수정X: Break the laws of reality.

조형가 (재귀창조) 분야 파워

  1. 1 영적 구조물A: Creates astral construct to fight for you.
    하급 제작, 사이오닉: Creates one cloth or wood object.
  2. 2 사이오닉 피해수리: Repairs construct of 3d8 hit points +1 hp/level.
  3. 3 무정형체 감추기, 상급: Quasi-real membrane grants you total concealment.
    심령 고치A: You encapsulate a foe so it can’t move.
  4. 4 제조, 사이오닉: Transforms raw goods to finished items.
    정수: You collapse a bit of time into a physical substance.
  5. 5 환호하는 유리결정A: A crystal explodes in an area, dealing 9d4 slashing damage.
  6. 6 유리결정화: Turn subject permanently to crystal.
    제조, 상급 사이오닉: Transforms a lot of raw goods to finished items.
  7. 7 심령 고치, 광역: You encapsulate all foes in a 20-ft. radius.
  8. 8 영적 씨앗: You plant the seed of your rebirth from the Astral Plane.
  9. 9 창세X: You instigate a new demiplane on the Astral Plane.
    진정한 제작X: As psionic major creation, except items are completely real.

정신감응가 (정신감응) 분야 파워

  1. 1 매혹, 사이오닉A: Makes one person your friend.
    정신연결A: You forge a limited mental bond with another creature.
  2. 2 혐오A: Subject has aversion you specify.
    두뇌 잠금A: Subject cannot move or take any mental actions.
    생각 읽기: Detect surface thoughts of creatures in range.
    제안, 사이오닉: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.
  3. 3 위기의 숨결A: Disrupt subject’s breathing.
    공감적 전환, 적의A: Your touch transfers your hurt to another.
    거짓 감각 입력A: Subject sees what isn’t there.
  4. 4 지배, 사이오닉A: Control target telepathically.
    정신연결, 훔치기A: Borrow knowledge of a subject’s power.
    기억 조작, 사이오닉: Changes 5 minutes of subject’s memories.
    분립: Your partitioned mind can manifest lower level powers.
  5. 5 메타콘서트A: Mental concert of two or more increases the total power of the participants.
    정신 조사: You discover the subject’s secret thoughts.
  6. 6 정신 개폐A,X: You switch minds with another.
  7. 7 위기의 생명A: Stop subject’s heart.
  8. 8 정신 씨앗X: Subject slowly becomes you.
  9. 9 정신 개폐, 진성X: A permanent brain swap.
    초자연적 외과의술X: You repair psychic damage or impart knowledge of new powers.

초자연 군인 파워

1-레벨 초자연 군인 파워

  • 영적 여행자: Enable yourself or another to join an astral caravan-enabled trip.
  • 생체 피드백A: Gain DR 2/–.
  • 늑대의 이빨: Gain bite attack for 1d8 damage.
  • 폭발: Gain +10ft. to speed this round.
  • 무기 호출A: Create temporary weapon.
  • 닻줄A: Instantly save yourself from a fall.
  • 카멜레온: Gain +10 enhancement bonus on Hide checks.
  • 야수의 발톱A: Your hands become deadly claws.
  • 압축A: You grow smaller.
  • 생각 감추기: You conceal your motives.
  • 사이오닉 탐지: You detect the presence of psionics.
  • 소멸의 손길A: Touch deals 1d6 damage.
  • 주의산만: Subject gets –4 on Listen, Search, Sense Motive, and Spot checks.
  • 엘프 시야: Gain low-light vision, +2 bonus on Search and Spot checks, and notice secret doors.
  • 텅빈 정신: Gain +2 on Will saves until your next action.
  • 확대A: Become one size category larger.
  • 부유A: Buoy yourself in water or other liquid.
  • 힘의 가림막A: Invisible disc provides +4 shield bonus to AC.
  • 강철 손아귀A: Your iron grip gives +4 bonus on grapple checks.
  • 망치A: Melee touch attack deals 1d8/round.
  • 관성 갑옷A: Tangible field of force provides you with +4 armor bonus to AC.
  • 메타피지컬 발톱A: Your natural weapon gains +1 bonus.
  • 메타피지컬 무기A: Weapon gains +1 bonus.
  • 나의 빛A: Your eyes emit 20-ft. cone of light.
  • 예지, 방어적A: Gain +1 insight bonus to AC and saving throws.
  • 예지, 공격적A: Gain +1 insight bonus on your attack rolls.
  • 선견, 공격적A: Gain +2 insight bonus on your damage rolls.
  • 선독A: Your claws gain a poison coating.
  • 선독 무기A: Your weapon is mildly venomous.
  • 스케이트: Subject slides skillfully along the ground.
  • 짓밟기A: Subjects fall prone and take 1d4 nonlethal damage.
  • 공감각: You receive one kind of sense when another sense is stimulated.
  • 피부 강화A: Gain +1 enhancement bonus to your AC for 10 min./level.
  • 활력A: Gain 5 temporary hit points.

2-레벨 초자연 군인 파워

  • 동물 친화력A: Gain +4 enhancement to one ability.
  • 신체 보정A: Heal 1d12 damage.
  • 신체 평형: You can walk on nonsolid surfaces.
  • 신체 정화A: Restore 2 points of ability damage.
  • 무정형체 감추기: Quasi-real membrane grants you concealment.
  • 암시야, 사이오닉: See 60 ft. in total darkness.
  • 호전적 의도 탐지: You can detect hostile creatures within 30 ft. of you.
  • 차원 교환A: You and an ally switch positions.
  • 용해의 손길A: Your touch deals 4d6 acid damage.
  • 용해의 무기A: Your weapon deals 4d6 acid damage.
  • 공감적 전환A: Transfer another’s wounds to yourself.
  • 에너지 적응, 명시A: Gain resistance 10 to one energy type.
  • 특기 거머리A: Borrow another’s psionic or metapsionic feats.
  • 빠른 걸음: Instantly gain a move action.
  • 부유, 사이오닉: You move up and down, forward and back, via mental support.
  • 고통스런 타격A: Your natural weapons deal an extra 1d6 nonlethal damage.
  • 기량: Instantly gain another attack of opportunity.
  • 사이오닉 향기: Gain the scent ability.
  • 사이오닉 사자의 발톱A: You can make full attack in same round you charge.
  • 상대방의 근력A: Siphon away your enemy’s strength and grow stronger.
  • 생활 유지: You can go without food and water for one day.
  • 생각 방패A: Gain PR 13 against mind-affecting powers.
  • 벽 걷는이: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

3-레벨 초자연 군인 파워

  • 뱀파이어의 발톱: Heal half of your claw’s base damage.
  • 무정형체 감추기, 상급: Quasi-real membrane grants you total concealment.
  • 위험 감각: Gain +4 bonus against traps.
  • 차원 슬라이딩A: Teleports you very short distance.
  • 이중차원 발톱: Increases your natural weapon’s threat range.
  • 심령 형태: You gain benefits of being insubstantial and can fly slowly.
  • 공감적 피드백A: When you are hit in melee, your attacker takes damage.
  • 공감적 전환, 적의A: Your touch transfers your hurt to another.
  • 탈출 탐지: You become difficult to detect with clairsentience powers.
  • 폭발 회피A: You take no damage from a burst on a successful Reflex save.
  • 검은 드래곤의 날숨A: Your acid breath deals 3d6 damage to a close target.
  • 무기 이식: Your hand is replaced seamlessly by your weapon.
  • 예리한 칼날, 사이오닉: Doubles normal weapon’s threat range.
  • 정신 장벽A: Gain +4 deflection bonus to AC until your next action.
  • 편재 시야: You have all-around vision.
  • 뱀파이어 칼날: You heal half of your base weapon damage.

4-레벨 초자연 군인 파워

  • 에너지 발톱: Your claws deal additional energy damage.
  • 차원의 문, 사이오닉: Teleports you short distance.
  • 에너지 적응A: Your body converts energy to harmless light.
  • 이동의 자유, 사이오닉: You cannot be held or otherwise rendered immobile.
  • 요지부동: You are almost impossible to move and gain DR 15/–.
  • 관성 장벽: Gain DR 5/–.

Psychic Vampire. Touch attack drains 2 power points/level from foe.

견고한 인지능력: Gain immunity to illusory effects, +6 bonus on Spot and Search checks.

진성독: Your natural weapons are covered in horrible poison.

진성독 무기: Your weapon is horribly poisonous.

에너지 무기: Weapon deals additional energy damage.

5-레벨 초자연 군인 파워

  • 신체 적응: Your body automatically adapts to hostile environments.
  • 캐텁시A: Psychic static inhibits power manifestation.
  • 메타콘서트A: Mental concert of two or more increases the total power of the participants.
  • 떡갈나무 육체A: Your body becomes as hard as oak.
  • 사이코피드백: Boost Str, Dex, or Con at the expense of one or more other scores.

6-레벨 초자연 군인 파워

  • 검은 드래곤의 숨결A: Breathe acid for 11d6 damage.
  • 무효화 방패: You are buffered from one dispel psionics effect.
  • 파멸의 형상A: You transform into a frightening tentacled beast.
  • 정신 공백, 개별: You are immune to scrying and mental effects.
  • 생명 연장: Put yourself into a state akin to suspended animation.
